episodes.title: Spiritbound Academy
episodes.description: A curse-scarred academy, a broken shrine, and the first step beyond the portal. Reach checkpoints to earn new cards.

shrine_awaken.title: Awakening at the Shrine
shrine_awaken.content: Cold stone under your palms. A broken shrine. A blue portal flickers like a heartbeat. In the distance, bells from Spiritbound Academy echo through fog.

choices.label: Follow the bells to the academy

portal_sigil.title: The Sigil Answers
portal_sigil.content: The sigil warms under your fingertips. The portal reacts ‚Äî not to power, but to intent. A whisper: 'Choose what you are willing to lose.'

academy_gate.title: Spiritbound Academy Gate
academy_gate.content: Students in ink-black robes watch from behind iron bars. A caretaker with hollow eyes offers you a lantern ‚Äî and a warning about the Mirror Hall.

mirror_hall.title: The Mirror Hall
mirror_hall.content: Mirrors line the corridor, each reflecting a version of you that made different choices. One mirror bleeds shadow ‚Äî a spirit is trapped inside.

spirit_pact.title: A Pact in Candlelight
spirit_pact.content: The spirit bows. It offers a pact: protection now, but a debt later. The academy watches. So does the portal.

ending_shattered.title: Ending: Shattered Truth
ending_shattered.content: The mirror breaks ‚Äî and so does something inside you. The portal opens wider, but the academy doors close. You leave with power and no allies.

ending_bound.title: Ending: The Spiritbound
ending_bound.content: The pact seals with a warm sting. The spirit stands beside you. The caretaker smiles ‚Äî not kindly, but knowingly. The story continues in your cards.

ending_alone.title: Ending: Lantern in the Fog
ending_alone.content: You refuse the debt. The hall goes silent. The lantern flickers, and you step back into the fog with your name intact ‚Äî and your fate unwritten.
